job_tasks.phrase: lead efforts within the Security Risk and Compliance organization to drive the development and maintenance of AI-enabled Risk and Compliance solutions across our products, downstream services, or infrastructure tools and platforms used within Uber globally!
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a leadership role focused on understanding and applying AI to specific business domains (Security, Risk, Compliance) across a global organization, aligning technical efforts with business objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive clarity and tackle ambiguous, challenging security, risk, and compliance problems using data-driven approaches
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to understand complex business problems within security, risk, and compliance and to use data to address them.

job_tasks.phrase: Propose and own data analysis (including modeling, coding, analytics, and experimentation) to drive business insight and facilitate decisions
job_tasks.justification: This task involves using data analysis, including modeling, to generate business insights and inform decision-making, demonstrating a strong understanding of how technical work impacts business outcomes.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop creative solutions and build prototypes for security, risk, and compliance problems using algorithms based on machine learning, statistics, and optimization
job_tasks.justification: Directly refers to the development and prototyping of solutions using machine learning, statistics, and optimization algorithms, which are core to modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Apply innovative solutions from Generative AI
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions the application of Generative AI, a form of advanced modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Optimize Machine Learning models for time efficiency, performance, cost, scalability, and accuracy
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on the refinement and tuning of ML models, a critical aspect of the modeling process.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop tools and processes for automatically training, updating, and evaluating Large Language Models (LLMs)
job_tasks.justification: This involves the core activities of developing processes for training, updating, and evaluating LLMs, which falls under modeling and MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: work with engineering/product to deploy those algorithms and make an impact in production
job_tasks.justification: Indicates collaboration with engineering teams for production deployment of algorithms, a key software development aspect.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop tools and processes for automatically training, updating, and evaluating Large Language Models (LLMs)
job_tasks.justification: While also related to modeling, developing tools and processes for automated training, updating, and evaluation points to MLOps practices.

soft_skills.phrase: Drive clarity and tackle ambiguous, challenging security, risk, and compliance problems using data-driven approaches
Propose and own data analysis (including modeling, coding, analytics, and experimentation) to drive business insight and facilitate decisions
lead efforts within the Security Risk and Compliance organization

classification.rationale: The role explicitly requires applying Generative AI and LLMs, including developing tools and processes for their training and evaluation. It emphasizes building AI-enabled solutions for business problems and working with engineering to deploy them, aligning perfectly with the GenAI Engineer profile's focus on user-facing systems built on generative models.
